lines.text: Why do you want to know so much about me?
How come you answer every question with a question?
Because I don't want to answer you.
From now on we are on our honeymoon.
So, I have to act as your...
...wife!

[laughs]
and you think people are actually gonna believe I married you?
I told you - I don't know how to dance
Come on. It's fun!
Oh shit!
I never had much of a honeymoon, Banks.
Me neither
You sure aren't what I expected
You sure are a tough guy.
What are you talking about?
You talk like a tough guy, you walk like a tough guy, you even order drinks like a tough guy...
I'm not a tough guy - I'm just careful!
Careful of what?
Of pretty women...

[to Bennie]
Meet my in the bar, here, in a half an hour.
Banks, can I ask you a question?
Yeah...
Is there anything you like about me?
No, not really.
And you wouldn't have told me if there was, right?
No, especially since you asked. Don't be detained.
